template.masthead: News for the Chaminade Ohana - November 2016 - Vol. 8

meta.og_twtr_desc: News and Events from the Chaminade Campus and Ohana.

content.title: Getting Down and Dirty
content.intro: Education students get hands-on STEM experience with their Palolo Stream investigation.

content.title: Pay it forward on #GivingTuesday
content.intro: Help make a difference in the lives of our students. Your generosity contributes to their success.

content.title: Lessons from an International Hotelier
content.intro: Raymond Bickson talks to business students about the hotel industry and leadership.

content.title: “Method to Music”
content.intro: Educators and parents learn how to teach music to keiki.

content.title: Coming Full Circle
content.intro: Generous donors meet their scholarship recipients at the annual scholarship luncheon.

content.title: “Think Service, Think Chaminade”
content.intro: Check out our spot showcasing Chaminade alumni pursuing their passion and contributing to our community.

content.title: “All Things Marianist” Episode 3
content.intro: Bro. Dennis Schmitz, SM, talks about ministering to incarcerated women and their children.

content.title: See You Tonight!
content.intro: Join the festivities, as we illuminate the campus for the holidays.

content.title: Christmas Off Campus
content.intro: 'Tis the season to volunteer. Help create a wonderful Christmas experience at the Next Step Shelter.

content.title: Immaculate Conception Mass
content.intro: We invite you to celebrate with us.
